tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Transportation_Options ( 
    option_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    option_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    option_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    available_seats INT, 
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) 
);

CREATE TABLE trains (
  train_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  train_name VARCHAR(255),
  departure_station VARCHAR(255),
  arrival_station VARCHAR(255),
  departure_time TIME,
  arrival_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE buses (
  bus_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bus_name VARCHAR(255),
  departure_city VARCHAR(255),
  arrival_city VARCHAR(255),
  departure_time TIME,
  arrival_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE rental_cars (
  car_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  car_model VARCHAR(255),
  rental_location VARCHAR(255),
  return_location VARCHAR(255),
  rental_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE trains (
    train_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    train_name VARCHAR(50),
    departure_time TIME,
    arrival_time TIME,
    origin VARCHAR(50),
    destination VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE buses (
    bus_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bus_name VARCHAR(50),
    departure_time TIME,
    arrival_time TIME,
    origin VARCHAR(50),
    destination VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE rental_cars (
    car_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    car_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    rental_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE travel_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    transportation_type VARCHAR(50),
    transportation_id INT,
    departure_date DATE,
    return_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Trains (
    train_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    train_name VARCHAR(255),
    departure_station VARCHAR(255),
    arrival_station VARCHAR(255),
    departure_time TIME,
    arrival_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Buses (
    bus_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bus_name VARCHAR(255),
    origin_city VARCHAR(255),
    destination_city VARCHAR(255),
    departure_time TIME,
    arrival_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE RentalCars (
    car_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    car_model VARCHAR(255),
    rental_agency VARCHAR(255),
    rental_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    available_from DATE,
    available_to DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Travelers (
    traveler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(255),
    last_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE Bookings (
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    traveler_id INT,
    booking_date DATE,
    booking_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (traveler_id) REFERENCES Travelers(traveler_id)
);
